commits.message: fix(hero): Reposition mobile 3D orbit text and refine spin effect
feat(hero): Add click-to-spin roulette effect and reposition 3D orbit text
fix(email): Update quote contact text to use explicit sales email
feat(email): Add email tracking and complete Resend migration
feat(hero): Add drag-to-spin 3D rotating text with momentum
fix(admin): Sync leadTimeText with leadTime on product save
fix(middleware): Remove 9 more redirects blocking actual products
fix(middleware): Remove redirect blocking galvanised foot valve product
revert: Remove 3D text mouse effects (OrbitalLayer, WatchBezel)
fix(home): Vertical mouse movement rotates same axis as horizontal
feat(home): Add watch bezel effect to teal curved text
style(home): Reduce search bar size by 20%
feat(home): Replace DepthLayer with OrbitalLayer for curved text
feat(home): Reposition orbiting curved text elements
fix(routes): Remove conflicting product redirects from middleware
feat(email): Migrate from nodemailer/SMTP to Resend HTTP API
